channel.title: +०५ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +०५ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.description: ०१ मूलम् - Weber कूर्ममु᳘पदधाति॥ र᳘सो वै᳘ कूर्मो र᳘समेॗवैतदु᳘पदधाति यो वै स᳘ एषां᳘ लोका᳘नामप्सु प्र᳘विद्धानाम् प᳘राङ्र᳘सो ऽत्य᳘क्षरत्स᳘ एष᳘ कूर्मस्त᳘मेॗवैतदु᳘पदधाति या᳘वानु वै र᳘सस्ता᳘वानात्मा स᳘ एष᳘ इम᳘ एव᳘ लोकाः᳟॥ Eggeling He then puts down a (living) tortoise;–the tortoise means life-sap: it is life-sap (blood) he thus bestows on (Agni). This tortoise is that life-sap of these worlds which flowed away from them when plunged into the waters 1: that (life-sap) he now bestows on (Agni).

०१ मूलम् - Weber पशुशीर्षाण्यु᳘पदधाति॥ पश᳘वो वै᳘ पशुशीर्षा᳘णि पशू᳘नेॗवैतदु᳘पदधाति ता᳘न्युखा᳘यामु᳘पदधातीमे वै᳘ लोका᳘ उखा᳘ पश᳘वः पशुशीर्षा᳘ण्येषु त᳘ल्लोके᳘षु पशू᳘न्दधाति त᳘स्मादिम᳘ एषु᳘ लोके᳘षु पश᳘वः॥ Eggeling He puts the heads of the victims in (the fire-pan),–the heads of the victims being animals (or cattle), it is animals he thus puts thereon. He puts them in the fire-pan;–the pan being these worlds, and the heads of the victims being beasts, he thus puts animals in these worlds; whence there are animals in these worlds.
